info.description: Retrieves account balances and summary information to be utilized for building customer Dashboard
info.title: US Model Bank Holdings summary

get.description: Get account and product information, balances, payment details, etc,.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: holdingsType
parameters.description: Contains the types of customer holdings

parameters.name: holdingsId
parameters.description: Contains the identifier specific to the holding details of the customer

parameters.name: getPreferredHoldings
parameters.description: Flag to fetch the preferred holding details (JWT required)

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Get Deposit information for publishing in dashboard
get.description: Get minimum deposit information for publishing in customer dashboard

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: balanceTypes
parameters.description: Type of balance (e.g. current balance, credit interest accrued, deferred commission, etc.) as defined in the institution's accounting schemas.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Get list of accounts, the product and account details
get.description: Get account balances for publishing in dashboard

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: limitReference
parameters.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Get account balance, overdraft, interest, payment schedule and joint holder information for publishing in customer dashboard

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

products.description: Contains the templates used for payment transactions

productLineName.description: Description of the product line, e.g. Client Consent for product line CONSENT.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

shortTitle.description: Short title given to the name of the arrangement

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

companyCode.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

sortCode.description: Contains bank sort code or iban branch identifier for the account

accountIBAN.description: Represents the International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the account.  E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

openingDate.description: The date the account is opened.

companyName.description: The company in which payment is processed

preferredProduct.description: Indicates the preferred product of the arrangement contract. This is required for only new arrangements and product change is not permitted

preferredProductPosition.description: Indicates to position of the preferred product of the arrangement contract. This is required for only new arrangements and product change is not permitted

preferredProductLabel.description: Indicates the label of the Preferred Product of the Arrangement contract. This is required for only new arrangements and product change is not permitted

permission.description: The act of permitting, especially in giving formal consent to access a particular file or repository.

onlineActualBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account, excluding any entries with a future processing date.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

availableBalanceWithLimit.description: Contains the maximum amount available to be drawn

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

arrangementStatus.description: Status of the arrangement. E.g. AUTH, CLOSE, UNAUTH etc.

totalPrincipal.description: Contains the amount borrowed or the part of the amount borrowed which remains unpaid

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

connectionId.description: Contains the id associated to the connect reference respective to a transaction of the account

balancesLastUpdated.description: Contains the last updated balances details

transactionsLastUpdated.description: Contains the list of last updated transactions

bankLogo.description: Indicates the logo of the bank

extSourceProvider.description: Contains the name of the external source provider for the customer

connectionStatus.description: Contains the connection status of the transaction

connectionSubStatus.description: Contains the connection sub status of the transaction

acctSwiftRef.description: Contains the swift reference of the account

paymentTemplate.description: Contains the template used for payment transactions

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

pendingDebits.description: Debits that are yet to be processed and placed as holds on accounts, but will not be available for use

pendingCredits.description: Credit transactions that are yet to cleared and made available in the account

blendedAPY.description: When tiered interest is applied, holds the blended APY considering the tiered interest rates. Blended APY is calculated based on principal amount in the account.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

branchId.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

branchName.description: Contains the description for the Organization Code defined at Branch Level.

routingNumber.description: Routing number of the bank where the account is held

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.

totalAccountBalances.description: Contains the final balances of all accounts after all transactions have taken place

totalDepositBalances.description: Contains the final balances of all deposit accounts after all transactions have taken place

totalLoanBalances.description: Contains the final balances of all loans after all payments have taken place

totalExtAccountBalances.description: Contains the final balances of all the external accounts

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

chargeTypes.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

taxRates.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

taxRate.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

charges.description: Specifies the charges which has incurred with processing of the cheque

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: Indicates Payment type set to an account

propertyName.description: Indicates the Id of the product property

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: Indicates the payment frequency associated with the charge

interestPaidYtd.description: Interest paid from the start of current year till current date

interestPaid.description: Interest earned on the account since account opening

settlements.description: Indicates settlement conditions associated with the account

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payinAccountId.description: Indicates the Payin Settlement Account. The account from which funds are to be debited against the payment type.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccountId.description: Indicates the Payout Settlement Account. The account into which funds are to be credited against the payment type.

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

propertyClassId.description: The identifier of a condition that is used to build a product

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

maturesIn.description: Indicates a date or period within which an account gets matured

coolingOffDate.description: Indicates cooling off period for an account until which pre-closure can be triggered without incurring any fees or charges.

term.description: Indicates the period to which the BID and OFFER rates apply

termAmount.description: The monetary amount applied to the account

cancellationPeriod.description: Indicates the Period beyond which a contract is cancelled if it not fully funded in case of deposit or fully disbursed in case of the loan

earlyRedemptionFee.description: Indicates the early redemption fee that is associated during closure before account maturity

withdrawalFee.description: Indicates fee charged for the withdrawals

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

accrualAmount.description: Indicates interest accumulated for an account for the defined time period

accruedInterest.description: The amount of interest that has been accrued

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

maturityInDays.description: Indicates the number of days within which an contract gets matured

remainingMaturityInDays.description: Indicates number of days remaining for maturity

commitmentAmount.description: Indicates the total amount which will be lent or deposited for the term

expectedBalance.description: Indicates the amount expected to be deposited by the customer

allowWithdrawal.description: Flag to indicate whether withdrawals are applicable for the account

unspecifiedCredit.description: Indicates an unallocated credit amount to an account

allowDeposit.description: Flag to indicate whether deposit is allowed to an account

allowWithdrawalUnclearedCredit.description: Flag to indicate whether withdrawals are allowed to an unallocated fund available in the account

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

blendedAPY.description: When tiered interest is applied, holds the blended APY considering the tiered interest rates. Blended APY is calculated based on principal amount in the account.

pendingCredits.description: Credit transactions that are yet to cleared and made available in the account

branchId.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

branchName.description: Contains the description for the Organization Code defined at Branch Level.

totalCredits.description: Contains the total number of credits

routingNumber.description: Routing number of the bank where the account is held

totalDebits.description: Contains the total number of debits

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.

totalDue.description: This amount represents the total due amount for that period.

jointRelationRoleIds.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

routingNumber.description: Routing number of the bank where the account is held

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.

lockedAmount.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

workingBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account and, unless it is a nostro or internal account, unauthorised debit entries.

onlineActualBalance.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions posted against the account, excluding any entries with a future processing date.

availableBalance.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance which includes the net movements of both debits and credits against the account.

bankDate.description: Identifies the message switch through which this message passed to or from its carrier

lastWorkingDate.description: Date of the last business day processed for this Company. This field will be set with the date from Today table by the batch (overnight) processing system.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

branchId.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

branchName.description: Contains the description for the Organization Code defined at Branch Level.

availableLimit.description: The portion of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nominated customer

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

openingDate.description: The date the account is opened.

closureDate.description: The date when the Security Account is to be closed

limitReference.description: Identifies the credit limit reference for the underlying account.

clearedBalance.description: Balance taking into consideration all cleared funds booked against the account, including credit and reversed debit entries with a future exposure date.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

pendingDebits.description: Debits that are yet to be processed and placed as holds on accounts, but will not be available for use

pendingCredits.description: Credit transactions that are yet to cleared and made available in the account

sharedLimitAccounts.description: Denotes the accounts in which the credit card Limit is assigned to the customer across all the credit cards

sharedLimitAccount.description: Denotes the accounts in which the credit card Limit is assigned to the customer across all the credit cards

sharedLimitAccountType.description: Indicates the type of shared limit account

taxRates.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

taxRate.description: Indicates tax charged to an account

interests.description: Contains the sum of the cash interest expense (including that attributable to Capitalized Leases), net of cash interest income, of the Borrower and the Restricted Subsidiaries, determined on a consolidated basis.

interestPropertyName.description: Contains the property name of loan interest such as penalty Interest and principal interest.

interestCompoundType.description: Indicates the interest compound type of an account

interestCompoundTypeValue.description: Indicates the interest compound type value of an account

interestPaidYtd.description: Interest paid from the start of current year till current date

interestPaid.description: Interest earned on the account since account opening

consolidateInterest.description: Contains the sum of the cash interest expense and net of cash interest income of the borrower and the restricted subsidiaries determined on a consolidated basis

sharedInterestAccounts.description: Contains the account details which shares the interest among the eligible or joint customers.

sharedInterestAccount.description: Contains the account details which shares the interest among the eligible or joint customers.

sharedInterestAccountType.description: Indicates the type of shared interest account

charges.description: Specifies the charges which has incurred with processing of the cheque

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

paymentTypeName.description: Indicates Payment type set to an account

propertyName.description: Indicates the Id of the product property

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

chargeSchedulePaymentValue.description: Indicates the payment frequency associated with the charge

jointRelationRoleIds.description: Role of joint customer with the main customer

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

openActualBalance.description: Contains the opening actual balance of an account

availableOverdraftLimit.description: Contains the overdraft limit still available to be utilized

openingDate.description: The date the account is opened.

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

availableFunds.description: Total funds available in the account after all the ongoing transactions have been completed

outstandingOverdraftLimit.description: Indicates the outstanding overdraft limit of an account

onlineClearedBalance.description: Indicates the available balance allowed to use

openClearedBalance.description: Indicates the opening balance after clearing

accountWithBankBIC.description: This is the BIC code of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

pendingCredits.description: Credit transactions that are yet to cleared and made available in the account

totalCredits.description: Contains the total number of credits

totalDebits.description: Contains the total number of debits

totalDue.description: This amount represents the total due amount for that period.

companyId.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

pendingDebits.description: Debits that are yet to be processed and placed as holds on accounts, but will not be available for use

branchId.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a branch of a financial institution.

branchName.description: Contains the description for the Organization Code defined at Branch Level.

routingNumber.description: Routing number of the bank where the account is held

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.
